Articles.Content: Time to dock the Hulk and go back to the beginning of space travel.

Welcome to the community dmc75287, it's always good to see new fans of KSP

I used to play Eve as well, it's an addictive game.

Welcome! While I'm not into online games now, I had played FPS games online but I've never played online-only games. If/ when Squad implements multiplayer in KSP, I'll be tempted to try that. Got my brother and a friend into KSP so online would be a natural progression.
I've been playing KSP so long that when I saw "Eve Online" the first thing that came to mind was a team of people using KMP to cooperatively build a station around a big purple planet.
Play both, least till you can help kill 70 titans in KSP too.
Never played EVE, but welcome to the KSP forums!

Well, there will be a time when the ksp multiplayer enables players to go into fierce battles with friends or foes, hopefully some sort of trading mod will be made for a full fledged combat sim.

There are some guys busy with weapons and armor (Infinitedice -=Skillful=- Combat Damage & Weapons mod, Lazor weapons,...).

I got high hopes for a real combat server and/or trading server.
